DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine clinical efficacy safety KM110329 Atopic dermatitis .
DOC.brief_title: KM110329 Adult Patients With Atopic Dermatitis
DOC.detailed_description: A randomized , double blind , placebo-controlled , multicenter trial conduct Seoul St.Mary 's Hospital , Chung-ang University hospital , Kyung Hee University Hospital Gangdong . Participants fulfil eligibility criterion select . Enrolled participant randomly allocate two parallel group : KM110329 placebo arm . Each participant examine sign symptom Atopic dermatitis take functional food .
DOC.criteria: Men woman age 18 65 year Individuals diagnose Atopic dermatitis accord criterion Hanifin Rajka Individuals mild moderate atopic dermatitis ( objective SCORADâ‰¤40 ) Written informed consent participation trial Severe skin disease Atopic dermatitis Secondary infection bacteria , fungi , virus Uncontrolled hypertension ( SBP > 145 mmHg DBP > 95 mmHg ) Severe liver disability ( 2.5fold normal high range value ALT , AST ) Severe renal disability ( sCr > 2.0mg/dl ) Women pregnant , lactating , plan pregnancy woman childbearing age agree proper contraception Use oral steroid , oral antibiotic immunosuppressant within past 4 week Treated systemic photochemotherapy within past 4 week History drug abuse Hypersensitivity Rubi Fructus , Houttuyniae Herba , Rehmanniae Radix , Betulae Platyphyllae Cortex Use investigational product within past two month
